摡字的基本解释

摡
gài
古同“溉”，洗涤。
主。

摡
xì
取。

摡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gài］
［《廣韻》古代切，去代，見。］
洗涤；洗拭。
[②]［xì］
［《廣韻》許既切，去未，曉。］
取。

摡字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页450第11
【唐韻】古代切【集韻】【韻會】居代切，?音槩。【說文】滌也。【詩·檜風·漑之釜鬵箋註】漑，本又作摡。古愛反。【周禮·天官·世婦】帥女官，而濯摡爲齍盛。【註】摡，拭也。【儀禮·少牢饋食禮】雍人摡鼎匕俎于雍爨，廩人摡甑甗匕與敦于廩爨。通作漑。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?許旣切，音餼。【博雅】取也。一曰拭也。或作?。

摡字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摡字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze

the Lord.

take.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gài］
["Guangyun" ancient cut, go to the generation, see. ]
Wash; wash and wipe.
[②]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xu Jiqie, Quwei, Xiao. ]
take.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摡; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 450 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Ancient cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Judai cut,? Sound. [Said Wen] Di also. 【Poetry·Hinofeng·Jianzhi's Cauldron Notes】漑, this is made again. Antiquity. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Shi Fu】A handsome female official, and Zhuo Kuang is Sheng Sheng. [Note] Press, wipe. [Rituals·Shao Lao Food Gifts] The Yong people squeeze the tripod dagger to Yong Cuan, the ling people squeeze the Zeng dagger and Dun Yu 廪爨. The pass is made.　[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Xu Diqie, sound. [Bo Ya] Take it too. One said, wipe it. Or for?.
